description: 1 of 3 jobs used to managed the deployment of testapp's canary

run.cmd:
export NEW_APP_DEFINITION_AS_BASE64_JSON='ThisIsAUniqueKey' \
&& curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mesosphere/dcos-commons/master/tools/dcos_login.py -o /dcos_login.py \
&& export DCOS_TOKEN=http://master.mesos \
&& unbuffer chmod u+x /usr/local/sbin/dcos \
&& unbuffer dcos config set core.dcos_url http://master.mesos \
&& export LANG="C.UTF-8" \
&& export LC_ALL="C.UTF-8" \
&& printf "\nBEGIN COMMAND 1\n"  \
&& sleep 1 \
&& echo $NEW_APP_DEFINITION_AS_BASE64_JSON | base64 --decode > /tmp/new-app-for-zdd.json \
&& sleep 2 \
&& printf "\nBEGIN COMMAND 2\n" \
&& unbuffer curl -k -v https://master.mesos/ca/dcos-ca.crt -o /tmp/dcos-ca.crt \
&& printf "\nBEGIN COMMAND 3\n" \
&& sleep 1 \
&& python /dcos_login.py master.mesos \
&& printf "\nBEGIN COMMAND 4\n" \
&& sleep 1 \
&& dcos package install --yes --cli dcos-enterprise-cli \
&& printf "\nBEGIN COMMAND 5\n" \
&& export DCOS_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_CREDENTIAL="$(dcos security secrets get /marathon-lb --json | jq -r .value | jq -c .)" \
&& printf "\nBEGIN ZERO DOWNTIME DEPLOYMENT SCRIPT\n" \
&& /marathon-lb/zdd.py --json /tmp/new-app-for-zdd.json \
--marathon-ca-cert /tmp/dcos-ca.crt \
--marathon http://master.mesos:8080 \
--marathon-lb http://marathon-lb.marathon.mesos:9090 \
--syslog-socket /dev/null \
--max-wait 1 \
--force \
--new-instances 1 \
&& sleep 10
